title: Looking for a kind of Gill Sans Condensed
content:
Hello,

Titles are set in Gill Sans (All Caps), and everybody was really happy with the Lorem.  
The real titles are sometimes very long and I need to fit them on one line.  
I would like to keep the same feeling, but switch to something more condensed.  
I don’t see any font like that in my lib, so any help would be very appreciated.

Note :  
I didn’t want to use Gill at first, and now I don’t want to leave it. ain’t that funny ?
